cast.name: 哈利勒·本·加尔比亚 Khalil Ben Gharbia
露易丝·马莱可 Louise Malek
弗拉维安·迪朗 Flavie Delangle
皮埃尔·贝内齐 Pierre Benezit

trans_title: 羞耻 法国版 第八季
introduction: Bilal, is always stylish and passionate about fashion, but in reality he is far from being a carefree teenager. He and his brother Zakaria have been on their own for a month and have been facing precariousness. Their mother, having lost her job during the Covid crisis is crawling under debt and left to work in the South. Everything changes when Bilal and Zakaria are evicted from their home. Fearing foster home and too ashamed to talk to La Mif about it, Bilal decides to fend for himself and his brother. Will Bilal manage to save appearances with La Mif and Redouane, his best friend who knows him by heart?
chinese_title: 羞耻 法国版 第八季
